mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_nm, mem_gender, mem_phone, mem_addr ) VALUES ( #{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memNm}, #{memGender}, #{memPhone}, #{memAddr} )
